programme.desc: Sea Anemones - Rory and Sandy look for sea anemones, whilst Chantelle meets a sea anemone expert.

programme.desc: Stress Test / How to Train Your Carl - The family tries to help Bobby get over his test taking anxieties. // Carl gets lost in the city zoo after sneaking away from his family, in search of Keyon, the Komodo dragon.

programme.desc: Operation Dad - Ronnie Anne tries to convince her Dad to move to the city while he is visiting. With the help of Sid, she devices a plan that seems too good to fail.

programme.desc: Game Overlord / Holi Moli - Sammy, Raj and Gabrielle team up for the Knights of the Galaxy tournament, but winning might be a bit of a challenge. // It's Holi! The boys can't wait to celebrate but when Malini decides to go to a teen only party - the boys get curious.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Theodore's Calling - Miss Croner attempts to help Theodore discover his true calling in life.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Clumsy Jeanette - Jeanette is suddenly the clumsiest person on the planet. Is there something wrong with her, or her new glasses?

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Adventures in Babysitting - Theodore gets roped into doing Alvin's babysitting sitting job with a spoiled four year old.

programme.desc: Growth Spout / Stuck in the Wringer - Mr. Krabs tries to find enough food to feed Pearl as she goes through her growth spurt. // After showering, SpongeBob gets stuck in his wringer.

programme.desc: Papa Times Two / Fake News - Vanity gives one of the Smurfs a makeover to look exactly like Papa Smurf. // Jokey tricks Poet into writing a sensational (but very fake) news story in the Daily Smurf.

programme.desc: Skatey Cat / Weather Beaten - Nervous to jump back on her board after a bad wipeout, will Ronnie Anne ever skate again? feat. Lincoln Loud. // A powerful artifact is coming to the Great Lakes City museum and it brings along a storm for the Casagrandes!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Horror-Scope - Ronnie Anne doesn't believe in an astrological prediction that 'love will find her,' until it seems to come true.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Intern for the Worse - Tensions run high when Lincoln and Clyde both get an internship at Flips and compete to win the manager title.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Bummer Camp / Sleepstakes - When Gramps struggles to run Camp Mastadon, the kids come to his rescue. //The Loud kids help Lana get over her fear of sleepovers.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Secret Legacy Pt. 1 - Robby has trouble adjusting after their family's big move to the rural town of Witwicky, until he and his sister, Mo, discover the first-ever Earthborn Transformers.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep165
programme.desc: House Sittin' for Sandy / Smoothe Jazz at Bikini Bottom - All is quiet while SpongeBob is house-sitting for Sandy... until Patrick shows up! // SpongeBob and Squidward lose their passes and try desperately to sneak backstage at the sold-out Kelpy G show.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep166
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble / The Way of the Sponge - When SpongeBob and Patrick accidentally destroy Sandy's air supply, they have to help her find more oxygen. // SpongeBob wants to earn his belt from karate master Fuzzy Acorns. Will Sandy be able to help?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep168
programme.desc: Restraining SpongeBob / Fiasco! - Squidward has had enough of SpongeBobs annoying antics and issues a restraining order against him. // Plankton thinks hes stolen a Krabby Patty from the Krusty Krab, but hes really stolen an art piece by the famous artist, Fiasco.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep180
programme.desc: Patrick-Man! / Gary's New Toy - Patrick becomes the superhero Patrick-Man, who intends to clean up Bikini Bottomwhether it wants it or not. // Gary becomes obsessed with his new red ball, forcing SpongeBob to take drastic measures to intervene.

programme.desc: Gary's Got Legs / King Plankton - Gary is given a set of limbs to keep up with SpongeBob, but soon makes his owner look sluggish by comparison. // Plankton practices ruling the world by shrinking himself down and declaring himself king of SpongeBob's aquarium.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep247
programme.desc: Swamp Mates / One Trick Sponge - Bubble Bass finds himself stranded with Patrick in a mysterious swamp, looking for a lost action figure. // SpongeBob learns a new magic trick, but he can't find anyone to watch it.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep248
programme.desc: The Krusty Bucket / Squid's on a Bus - Plankton creates a clone of himself and Mr. Krabs, but neither restaurant is safe from the newcomer. // Squidward gleefully switches jobs with a bus driver for an easy ride... until SpongeBob and Patrick climb aboard.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep249
programme.desc: Sandy's Nutty Nieces / Insecurity Guards - SpongeBob gets in over his head when he volunteers to babysit Sandy's 3 nieces. // SpongeBob and Patrick volunteer as guards at the museum, while Squidward attempts to hang his painting unnoticed.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Stair Wars / Enemies a la Mode - Patrick and GrandPat try to pass each other on the stairs, leading to a ludicrous conflict. // The members of the Star family each confront their own absurd rivalries.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Klopnodian Heritage Festival - The Star Family learns the cultural traditions of the old country.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Break Up - When two Croc Bandits have a spat, it's up to Po and Mr. Ping to set things right.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Kung Shoes - In an attempt to get out of training, Po buys some enchanted shoes that will heighten his kung fu abilities. Unfortunately for Po, the magical shoes are evil and will soon put him and all those around him in great danger.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep307
programme.desc: The Runaway - When Toph discovers a quick way to make cash, Katara disapproves, and the rift between them has disastrous consequences.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Mental Hen - A Delaware Blue Hen has taken up residence at the zoo, and she has the amazing ability to predict the future!.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Marble Jar Head / Good Night and Good Chuck - How in the world is Rico supposed to behave well when King Julien has kidnapped his doll, Miss Perky? // When the Penguins try to get the anchor man Chuck Charles back on TV they find themselves in front of the camera.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Littlefoot / Smotherly Love - Marlene is dying to go see a concert in the park. But, every time she leaves the zoo she becomes a feral monster! // Ma, an empty-nested mother possum, takes up residence in the Penguins Lair after they destroy her home.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Quazy for Vanessa / Tunnel of Fear - SwaySway and Buhdeuce disguise the rocket van as a girl to keep Oonski from stealing it, but their planbackfires when Oonski falls head-over-wheels in love. // The ducks are forced to enter into a scary part of the bread mines.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep107
programme.desc: When Dragons Cry - To get the dragon's tears needed for Axe, the group must first visit a magical marketplace, where Stacey's meeting with a witch finally reveals Brendar's complicated backstory.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Ollie Dogs / Camp Magna - Ollie offers a monster realm condiment for his hot dog stand, accidentally causing weird side effects. // Ollie and his classmates go on a camping trip. Ollie uses the pack to avoid roughing it, attracting Andre and Bev.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Gumbus / Mrs. Cuddles - Leo, Mikey and April investigate a mysterious specter that haunts a themed supermarket. // April and the brothers make Raph face his greatest fear... an adorable kids' TV show bunny.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Traffical Island / Partybot - The kids turn against Sanjay when he maroons them all on a highway median. // Sanjay and Craig find an old robot and become party animals.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Dorg is Ghosted / Dorg and the Meltdown - Yooki is caught in one of Mr. Munch's ghost traps, Dorg and the gang must rescue her before she's revealed on TV and sent back to Area 52! // A video game from RD's planet infects every machine in Normill, Dorg and the gang must stop the chaos!

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Man-Arctica the Ride / Fanbidextrous - Fanboy and Chum Chum are extremely excited to ride the new Man-Arctica roller coaster. // When Fanboy discovers that people can use BOTH of their hands, he trains his left arm to do everything his right arm can do.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Dudley Do-Wrong / Puppy Unplugged - The Chameleon impersonates Mayor Teddy Bear and closes down TUFF, turning all of Petropolis against our heroes. // Birdbrain plunges the world into a technology-less void.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep501
programme.desc: The Spill - The Winx continue to rock it out in Gardenia where people's belief in magic has been restored. In the kingdom of Andros, Aisha's Uncle Neptune plans to make his son Nereus Crown Prince.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep502
programme.desc: The Rise of Tritannus - The Winx hold a benefit concert to raise money to clean up after an oil spill. Meanwhile, Tritannus absorbs the toxic pollution. He and the Trix escape the prison, and begin their quest to rule the magic dimension.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Festa Perrfeita / O Novato Anbis - Felicity worries that her powers won't measure up at a party for the most powerful and popular citizens in Mythlandia. // An ancient Anubis king tests Miguel to see if he's ready to leave Mythlandia and become the next ruler.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Man Ray Returns / Larry the Floor Manager - When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation! // Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep221
programme.desc: No Pictures, Please / Stuck on the Roof - Patrick leads an enthusiastic stranger on a tour of his favorite places in Bikini Bottom. // SpongeBob is afraid to get off the roof of the Krusty Krab, but he won't let that stop him from living his life!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep222

programme.desc: The 2024 US Presidential election campaigning is already heating up.Ian Bremmer talks about how the two political parties' campaigning will affect US policymaking and influence US relations with Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk

programme.desc: Workers at a sawmill use the latest tools and their honed skills to prepare the building blocks of Edo life: long, narrow beams, bamboo stems and leftover wood stacked as high as buildings.

programme.title: Rising
programme.desc: Follow a unique online service that is fighting back against regional decline by matching long-established small local businesses with younger people keen to relocate and take on a new challenge.

programme.title: Document 72 Hours
programme.desc: In the final 3 days of an old-fashioned amusement park in Fukuoka, southwestern Japan, visitors flocked to bid it farewell. We asked them why the park held a special place in their hearts.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Aspinall vs. Tybura
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC is back in London on July 22 for another action-packed event at The O2 Arena, and in the main event, its the highly anticipated return of Englands own Tom Aspinall, as he takes on Polish powerhouse Marcin Tybura in the five-rounder that closes UFC on ESPN. After winning his first five UFC bouts, all by knockout or submission, Aspinals meteoric rise up the heavyweight ladder was momentarily halted by an injury in July of 2022. But this summer, Aspinall is back and eager to make up for lost time against Tybura, who is coming off back-to-back wins over Alexandr Romanov and Blagoy Ivanov
